ygData.subject: Re: Splitting Spawns using Lament - Pumice - Resists
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is very doable. I ve done it two times now. Put 8 minutes between each pull so that there was a nice spread between fights and we pulled all night. I
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Ronnie Roads <rkroads@...>


>I have not tried to split the Lord room in Lower, although it is quite open
>and
>would be easy to try.

This is very doable. I've done it two times now. Put 8 minutes between each
pull so that there was a nice spread between fights and we pulled all night.
I lost all the lottos though. :)



>Also, the group of 4 fire giants in Sol B - I know they cannot be
>mesmerized.

I don't know about Lament and the fire giants (we had a monk pulling for us
the 2 times I did this), but Pixie Strike worked on the fire giants. Tenya
kept one giant out of the fight while we killed Skarlon. I had always heard
that mez didn't work on them too until I saw it.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 50 Bard
Solusek Ro
